column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is a nice place to go with 1-2 other people. Their variety of sangrias are tasty and most of the food is good (and reasonably priced). I will say
column3: that I think the paella is overpriced. Some of my fav items are the goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column5: and calamari. The desserts are perfect sized (get the chocolate cake!)
